Recruiters are absolutely crashing out on LinkedIn right now.
Apparently, asking about salary, benefits, remote work, or—God forbid—paying your bills is now a “red flag.”

In this video, we break down the most unhinged recruiter and CEO takes flooding LinkedIn:

Candidates getting rejected for asking about pay
Recruiters bragging about making candidates cry
Being late by 3 minutes = instant disqualification
CEOs “testing patience” by showing up late themselves
Judging candidates by their car, commute, or Zoom setup
Calling candi
title: RECRUITERS ARE CRASHING OUT HARD ON LINKEDIN!
